sense.def:
Govorec ali pisec uporabi besedo
yours
, kadar hoče pokazati, da nekaj pripada osebi ali osebam, na katere so naslovljene njegove besede, ali je povezano z njo ali njimi.

seg.quote: Our swimming pool isn't as deep as yours.
A student of yours came to see me.

sense.def:
Izraze
Yours
,
Yours sincerely
ali
Yours faithfully
napišemo na koncu pisma, preden se podpišemo.
